profileAlternative.name: Don McGimpsey
profileAlternative.headline: Lead Data Scientist at Wolters Kluwer
profileAlternative.summary:
My vocabulary does not include the phrase "Cannot be done". In my past, I have had a manager tell me: "If it was easy, I would do it myself"

I believe that there is no problem too big that it cannot be solved by breaking it down into individual components. The secret of mastering technology is mastering the problem.

Another motto or maxim that I follow is "If I can't do it, somebody else will" By this, I mean that I will never refuse any assignment, and I will add value to the result so that the customer is not only satisfied, but blown away.

Sometimes, the problem is different from the request. It is very important to understand that the solution may not be what the customer asked for - ie: "Just what they asked for but not what they wanted" This scenario should always be avoided.

Another boss once told me that no matter what you do - you should become the expert in that domain - so much so that people come to you for the answers.

I am a strong believer in Rapid Prototyping and Development. The SDLC analysis phase should contain at a minimum, a mockup, a proof of concept and a working prototype. By having a working prototype, no one can ever tell you that it cannot be done.

Specialties: Expert solutions.

given.text:
Kanchi is one of the brightest and most dedicated professionals I have had the pleasure of working with. She was always willing to pick up the slack, and take on responsibilities that were within her reach. Project management was a task she relished and through her contributions, millions of dollars were attributable to the bottom line

I strongly endorse Kanchi.

Don McGimpsey
Big Data manager, Wolters Kluwer See less

Abhishek is one of the most innovative thought-leaders I have worked with.

Abhishek's enthusiasm and commitment to pursuing ideas through to completion has led to many innovative solutions, increasing efficiency, throughput and millions of dollars in bottom-line profit.

I strongly endorse Abhishek, his knowledge, intelligence and ability to grasp complex problems makes him suitable for any position that he pursues.

Don McGimpsey See less

items: Capital Markets Production Support at Fannie Mae

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Data Scientist, Team Lead at ThoughtTrace
Lead Data Scientist at Mercury Data Science
Director, Data and Operational Excellence at Wolters Kluwer
Vice President - Head of Customer Insights at Wolters Kluwer
Lead Data Scientist, Technical Architect and Founder at QKSS, Inc.
Financial Controller at Ascendant Advisors, LLC
